title: (x) The "Information Highwayman" titles font ? - a Bodoni {Craig, Riccardo}
content:
Hi,  
does anybody know what's the font used for the titles on the D Bnonn Tennant's website : [Information Highwayman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065330/http:/informationhighwayman.com/) ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/information-highwayman-font_4271.gif)

Thanks by advance :)
author: Aure

comments.content: Some Bodoni or other, I think, though it looks a little taller than what I'm finding.

Ok,  
I've done some tests and I didn't managed to fit perfectly a Bodoni but it seems to be that.  
Thanks a lot for your answer :)

These are the most similar I could come up with:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sh/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065330/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sh/light/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sh/light/")  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sb/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065330/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sb/light/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/bodoni-no-1-sb/light/")
